entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, who is advising Harry.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Fearsome creatures that are mentioned as a threat to the Quidditch match.

entities.name: ravenclaw

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Harry's house at Hogwarts, which won the House Championship last year.

entities.name: chocolate frog
entities.description: A treat that Harry is eating.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about the dementors showing up at the Quidditch match.
Gryffindor and Ravenclaw are competing against each other in the Quidditch match.
Harry is a member of Gryffindor house.
Lupin is advising Harry on how to concentrate.
Harry is eating the Chocolate Frog.
